how_to_help_section.title: What can I do to help people living on the streets near me?

items.text: Post a free resource you found.
items.subText: Such as, food, shelters, clothing, showers, computer/wifi, public libraries, public toilets, support groups, activites, medical, or any other beneficial resource.

items.text: Or, offer something I can do to support people who are homeless nearby.
items.subText: to find and suggest effective ideas to offer.
